titleStmt.title: Encouragement to charity a sermon preached at the Charter-House Chapel Dec. 12, 1678, at an anniversary meeting in commemoration of the founder / by William Durham.
titleStmt.author: Durham, William, d. 1686.

notesStmt.note: Entry for Wing D2830 cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.
Reproduction of originals in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Folger Shakespeare Library.
